description: The summer sun can be fierce, and as you climb, UV levels increase. The Cormac Hoody is specifically created to help shield climbers, hikers – anyone seeking mountain adventure – from the sun and keep them comfortable on the move. One of their lightest fabrics, the Ostria™ polyester is airy and exceptionally comfortable. A brimmed helmet-compatible hood protects the face, thumb loops hold sleeves in place, and low-profile seams ride comfortably under a pack.
name: Arcteryx Cormac Hoody - Mens
